description: PHASE 2: Remove Wave filter button event listener binding from AppsOverviewWorldClass.bindEvents() method.
rationale: The HTML button was removed in Phase 1. This removes the orphaned JS event listener that tries to find and bind to a non-existent DOM element.
impact: Removes dead code that would throw warnings if btnFilterMatrixWaveOverview was referenced. Cleans up module initialization.
section: JavaScript - AppsOverviewWorldClass.bindEvents() - Wave filter listener block

checks: Wave filter button listener code found in bindEvents() around line 11327
btnFilterMatrixWaveOverview element selector still references removed button

steps: 3. Verify NO errors about 'btnFilterMatrixWaveOverview' not found

notes: Phase 2 of 3: Remove dead JS event binding. Phase 3 will remove the unused showWaveFilterPanel() method entirely.
